name: Patchu
description:
A quick and fun stand-alone version of Patchu, a polyhedral dice game able to be played with a D6, D8, D10, and D12 for each player. Each player rolls their dice, then takes turns stealing dice from other players in order to try to earn points by making valuable sets.

I invented Patchu as a fun little mini-game for my homebrew tabletop RPG system, and wanted to be able to play without having to recruit friends to play with me. Thus, Patchu the video game was born!
